nav.div: Effingham Community Schools » Emergency Information » Food Service Closure Program

strong.span: Effingham Unit #40 Food Service during School Closure

div.p: Beginning on Tuesday, March 17, 2020, Effingham Unit #40 will provide sack lunches and a snack for any student who needs one. These lunches will be provided in the manner listed below:
· Effingham Unit #40 will have employee volunteers at each site to distribute the food.

div.h4: Effingham Community Schools Board of Education
